classroom,"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"時間をかけて元々内向的なニミッツの心を","translatedEnglishLine":"and, over time, succeeded in opening up Nimitz's originally introverted translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そっか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間がそんな剣持ってたところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if a human held such a sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様には関係ありませんわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't concern Lord Lexington, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ちょ、ちょっと待って！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (W-wait a moment!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人も殺せるって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It can even kill demons...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなの初耳なんだけど！？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the first time I've heard of that!?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、戦いが始まったようですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it looks like the battle has started."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ、ズバーンっと行ってきて下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, please go and slash through!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様、フレー、フレー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lexington, go, go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （え、えええええ！？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (W-what!?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の中、赤褐色の鬼は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of the battlefield, the reddish-brown demon

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その戦い方も合わせて一際目立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood out all the more because of his fighting style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっっ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guaah!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、うわぁぁぁああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, waaahhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ！　一時退け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good! Fall back for now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の攻撃で逃げ惑う兵達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington watched with cold eyes the soldiers scattering in panic from his attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは冷めた瞳で見ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington was looking with cold eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （弱っちい……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Pathetic...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の兵達は当然ながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers of the Leesas army, naturally,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのほとんどが屈強な軍人である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were mostly sturdy soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、自分の軽い攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yet, they were unable to respond to his light attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対応出来ずに蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ回る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and scattered like spiders fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なーんだ、みんな本当はこんな弱かったんだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (So that's it, everyone was actually this weak...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の中には圧倒的な力を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the soldiers, many were overwhelmed by this overwhelming power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死の恐怖を前にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in the face of the fear of death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 涙を浮かべている者も数多くいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were many who had tears in their eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （苛められていた頃の……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They have the same face as when I was bullied...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私みたいな顔してる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They look like me.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは遠い昔のこと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a long time ago...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス西部の村で育った少女、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl who grew up in a village in western Leesas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ・リーク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz Leak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は子供の頃から苛められ続けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been bullied ever since she was a child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由は些細なことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason was trivial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目つきが悪い、顔が悪い、性格が暗い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her eyes were harsh, her face unfriendly, her personality gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったそれだけのことで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just for those reasons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目つきが嫌い、顔が嫌い、性格が嫌い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said they hated her eyes, face, and personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言われるようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She became someone people said that about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在が嫌い、憎たらしい、疎ましい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hated her existence, found her detestable and unpleasant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臭い、汚い、醜い。死んで欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Smelly, dirty, ugly. They wished she would die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子ってなんで生きてるんだろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is that girl even alive, I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いなくなってくれたらいいのにね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wish she would just disappear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分が嫌われてるって自覚ないんじゃないの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Doesn't she realize how much everyone hates her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな村の小さな子供達の純粋な悪意。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pure malice of little children in a small village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば冗談交じりの軽い気持ちで放たれた暴言を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving these harsh words, half in jest, half lightly said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々内向的だった彼女の性格は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her originally introverted personality

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に歪に育っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grew even more twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして私だけがこんな目に遭うの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why am I the only one who has to go through this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつこんなことは終わるの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When will this ever end?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えもないままただ耐え続けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without any answers, she just continued to endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツの生活に二つの光明が差す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two rays of hope shone into Nimitz's life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは村に引っ越してきた同級生アマデス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One was Amades, a classmate who moved into the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして新しく担任となった教師、メルフェイス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the other was Melface, the newly assigned homeroom teacher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも教室で孤立していたニミッツに優しく接し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both kindly approached Nimitz, who was isolated in the classroom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間をかけて元々内向的なニミッツの心を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and, over time, succeeded in opening up Nimitz's originally introverted heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開くのに成功していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They succeeded in unlocking it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の中、赤褐色の鬼は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of the battlefield, the reddish-brown demon

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その戦い方も合わせて一際目立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood out all the more because of his fighting style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっっ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guaah!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、うわぁぁぁああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, waaahhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ！　一時退け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good! Fall back for now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の攻撃で逃げ惑う兵達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington watched with cold eyes the soldiers scattering in panic from his attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは冷めた瞳で見ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington was looking with cold eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （弱っちい……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Pathetic...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の兵達は当然ながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers of the Leesas army, naturally,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのほとんどが屈強な軍人である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were mostly sturdy soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、自分の軽い攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yet, they were unable to respond to his light attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対応出来ずに蜘蛛の子を散らすように逃げ回る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and scattered like spiders fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （なーんだ、みんな本当はこんな弱かったんだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (So that's it, everyone was actually this weak...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵の中には圧倒的な力を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the soldiers, many were overwhelmed by this overwhelming power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死の恐怖を前にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in the face of the fear of death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 涙を浮かべている者も数多くいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were many who had tears in their eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （苛められていた頃の……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (They have the same face as when I was bullied...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私みたいな顔してる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They look like me.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは遠い昔のこと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was a long time ago...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス西部の村で育った少女、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl who grew up in a village in western Leesas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ・リーク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz Leak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は子供の頃から苛められ続けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She had been bullied ever since she was a child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由は些細なことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason was trivial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目つきが悪い、顔が悪い、性格が暗い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her eyes were harsh, her face unfriendly, her personality gloomy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったそれだけのことで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just for those reasons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目つきが嫌い、顔が嫌い、性格が嫌い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They said they hated her eyes, face, and personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言われるようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She became someone people said that about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在が嫌い、憎たらしい、疎ましい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hated her existence, found her detestable and unpleasant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臭い、汚い、醜い。死んで欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Smelly, dirty, ugly. They wished she would die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子ってなんで生きてるんだろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is that girl even alive, I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いなくなってくれたらいいのにね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wish she would just disappear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分が嫌われてるって自覚ないんじゃないの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Doesn't she realize how much everyone hates her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな村の小さな子供達の純粋な悪意。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pure malice of little children in a small village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば冗談交じりの軽い気持ちで放たれた暴言を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving these harsh words, half in jest, half lightly said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々内向的だった彼女の性格は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her originally introverted personality

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に歪に育っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grew even more twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして私だけがこんな目に遭うの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why am I the only one who has to go through this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつこんなことは終わるの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When will this ever end?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 答えもないままただ耐え続けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without any answers, she just continued to endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツの生活に二つの光明が差す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two rays of hope shone into Nimitz's life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは村に引っ越してきた同級生アマデス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One was Amades, a classmate who moved into the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして新しく担任となった教師、メルフェイス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the other was Melface, the newly assigned homeroom teacher.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも教室で孤立していたニミッツに優しく接し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both kindly approached Nimitz, who was isolated in the classroom,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間をかけて元々内向的なニミッツの心を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and, over time, succeeded in opening up Nimitz's originally introverted heart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開くのに成功していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They succeeded in unlocking it.
